H0.text: In what year was the most recent census in the UK . 2011

H1.text: In what year was the most recent census in the UK . 1991

H2.text: In what year was the most recent census in the UK . 2021

H3.text: In what year was the most recent census in the UK . 2001

A4.text: The most recent UK census took place in England, Wales and Northern Ireland on 21 March 2021.

A5.text: Because of the COVID-19 pandemic, the census in Scotland was delayed to 20 March 2022.

A6.text: The UK Census of Population 2011 is available as an official archived version.

A7.text: The UK Census of Population 1981 (Concepts and Techniques in Modern Geography)

A8.text: The 2011 census was held in all countries of the UK on 27 March 2011.

A9.text: The first results from the 2011 census, age and sex, and occupied households estimates for England and Wales and Northern Ireland, were released on 16 July 2012.
